item.title: Gulp vs .net
item.description: I wanted to add continuous code coverage to my little extension library project, and so realised i would need to run one of nCover, dotCover or openCover from the command line on my build server. This calls for a task based build automation library! Because I’m started to learn more about this nodejs thing as a .Net developer, I figured I should give one of the build automation projects from there a go, even though my project is a .
